snippet: Union Rags, the Belmont Stakes winner, has a minor ligament injury in his left front leg and will be sidelined for the rest of the year.
abstract: Belmont Stakes winner Union Rags has a minor ligament injury in his left front leg and will be sidelined for the rest of the year.
lead_paragraph: Union Rags, the Belmont Stakes winner, has a minor ligament injury in his left front leg and will be sidelined for the rest of the year.

headline.seo: Belmont winner Union Rags out with ligament injury
